avdta.gui.editor.visual.rules

Class LinkBusRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.gui.editor.visual.rules.LinkRule
      • avdta.gui.editor.visual.rules.LinkBusRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class LinkBusRule
extends LinkRule
    This class color-codes links used by buses. This class must be constructed around a project with buses. If no buses are found, no links will match. Links that are used by buses will be marked in red. Links that are used by buses, that only have a single lane, may be optionally marked in blue.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructs this LinkBusRule.
